sentences.text: Deferred Stock Units are stock price-based units into which deferred compensation has been invested pursuant to the deferred compensation plans for management and for non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units are stock price-based units granted as long term incentive awards to management and as equity compensation to non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders have no voting rights with respect to either Deferred Stock Units or Restricted Stock Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The value of Deferred Stock Units and Restricted Stock Units varies with the price of Praxairs common stock and, at the end of the deferral period or the restriction period, the units are payable in Praxair common stock on a one-for-one basis.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have received printed copies in the mail, rather than the notice of Internet availability, it is likely that this occurred because either: (1) you have specifically requested printed copies this year or previously, or (2) Praxair has voluntarily sent you printed copies.

sentences.text: If you are receiving printed copies, you can save Praxair future postage and printing expense by consenting to receive future annual reports, meeting notices, and proxy statements on-line on the Internet.

sentences.text: If you share an address with another shareholder, you may receive only one notice of Internet availability, or one set of printed proxy materials (including this Proxy Statement and the 2016 Form 10-K and Annual Report to shareholders) unless you have provided contrary instructions.

sentences.text: If you wish to receive a separate notice of Internet availability or set of proxy materials now or in the future, you may contact the bank or broker that manages your account or, if you are a shareholder of record, you may contact Wells
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similarly, if you share an address with another shareholder and have received multiple copies of the notice of Internet availability or proxy materials, you may contact the bank or broker that manages your account or, if you are a shareholder of record, you may contact Wells Fargo Shareowner Services at the above address to request delivery of only a single copy of these materials to your household.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are the Proxies Voted?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because many shareholders cannot attend the Annual Meeting in person, it is necessary that a large number be represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most shareholders have a choice of voting over the Internet, by using a toll-free telephone number, or by completing a proxy card or voting instruction card, as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares entitled to vote and represented by a properly completed proxy (either by Internet, telephone or mail) will be voted at the Annual Meeting as indicated on the proxy unless earlier revoked by you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no instructions are indicated for a matter on an otherwise properly completed proxy from a shareholder of record, the shares represented by that proxy will be voted on that matter as recommended by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See also the vote counting rules below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Execution of the proxy also confers discretionary authority on the proxy holders to vote your shares on other matters that may properly come before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have Internet access, you may access the Proxy Statement and 2016 Form 10-K and Annual Report and submit your proxy or voting instructions by following the instructions provided in the notice of Internet availability, or if you received printed proxy materials, by following the instructions provided with your proxy materials and on your proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote on the Internet, you can also request electronic delivery of future proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How Can I Revoke my Proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is voted by filing with Praxairs Corporate Secretary a written revocation, by timely delivery of a properly completed, later-dated proxy (including by Internet or telephone), or by voting in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can also vote by telephone by following the instructions provided on the Internet voting site, or if you received printed proxy materials, by following the instructions provided with your proxy materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A vote to Abstain will have the effect of a vote against this item.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Item #3 (Advisory Vote on Named Executive Officer Compensation), Item #4 (Advisory vote on the Frequency of holding future advisory votes on Named Executive Officer Compensation), and Item #5 (Approval of amendments to the Amended and Restated 2009 Praxair, Inc. Long Term Incentive Plan and approval of performance goals under the Plan), your broker is not entitled to vote your shares on these items if no instructions are received from you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes are not considered shares entitled to vote on these matters and, therefore, will have no effect on the vote on these items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, a vote to Abstain will have the effect of a vote against these items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the Necessary Quorum to Transact Business at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote shall constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares represented by abstentions and broker non-votes on filed proxies and ballots will be considered present for quorum purposes (for an explanation of broker non-votes, see the vote counting rules below).

sentences.text: SEC Rule 14a-8:  In order to be included in Praxairs proxy statement and form of proxy for Praxairs 2018 annual meeting of shareholders, a shareholder proposal must be received in writing at Praxairs principal executive offices on or before November 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access:  In January, 2016, the Board of Directors amended our By-Laws to implement a Proxy Access structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This allows a shareholder or a group of up to 20 shareholders owning shares representing at least 3% of Praxairs common stock continuously for at least three years, to nominate and include in our Proxy Statement their own Director nominee(s) constituting up to 20% of the total number of Directors then serving on the Board (with a minimum of up to two Director nominees), provided that the shareholder(s) and the nominee(s) satisfy the Proxy Access requirements in our By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of Director nominees must include the information required under our By-Laws and must be received by our Corporate Secretary at our principal executive offices no earlier than the close of business (5:00 p.m. Eastern Time) on October 16, 2017 and no later than the close of business on November 15, 2017, unless the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders has been changed by more than 30 calendar days from the anniversary of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, such notice must be received by our Corporate Secretary no earlier than the close of business on the 180th calendar day before the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and no later than the close of business on the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advance Notice Provisions:  Under the terms of Praxairs Certificate of Incorporation, a shareholder who intends to present any item of business or a Director nomination at the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (other than through inclusion in Praxairs Proxy Statement under SEC Rule 14a-8 or the Proxy Access Provisions of our By-Laws), must provide us with written notice of such business at our principal executive offices, including the information specified in the Certificate of Incorporation, which must be received no earlier than January 25, 2018 and no later than February 24, 2018, unless the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders has been advanced by more than 30 calendar days or delayed by more than 60 calendar days from the anniversary of the 2017 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In that case, such notice must be received by our Corporate Secretary no earlier than the close of business on the 90th calendar day before the date of the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders and no later than the close of business on the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long Term Incentive Plan (the Plan) was adopted by the Board of Directors of Praxair, Inc. on January 24, 2017, and shall become effective upon shareholder approval on April 25, 2017 (the Amendment Effective Date).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan is hereby amended as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 4.1 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.1  Number of Shares Available for Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to adjustment as provided in Section 4.5, the total number of Shares whichthat may be issued pursuant to Awards under this Plan on or after April 25, 2017 (the Amendment Effective Date shall be 8,000,000 Shares) is 8,000,000 Shares, plus the number of authorized Shares remaining available from the 8,000,000 Shares authorized for grant under the terms of this Plan immediately prior to the Amendment Effective Date and any additional Shares that become available for issuance under the Plan in accordance with Section 4.2 (including, for the avoidance of doubt, under Awards granted under this Plan prior to the Amendment Effective Date) (the Share Authorization).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Shares available for issuance under this Plan may be authorized and unissued Shares or treasury Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of Shares of the Share Authorization that may be issued pursuant to ISOs under this Plan following the Amendment Effective Date shall be 8,000,000 Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of Shares of the Share Authorization that may be issued under this Plan pursuant to Awards other than Options or SARs following the Amendment Effective Date shall be 2,600,000 Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 4.2 of the Plan is amended to add the following sentence to the end thereof:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in no event shall Shares underlying any underwater Option that is voluntarily surrendered by a Participant become available for grant under the Plan pursuant hereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 4.4 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.4  Director Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to retain and compensate Directors for their services, and to strengthen the alignment of their interests with those of the shareholders of the Company, the Plan permits the grant of stock- based awards to Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aggregate compensation (including Awards) to any one Director in respect of any calendar year, solely with respect to his or her service as a Director, may not exceed $750,000750,000, with the value of any Awards hereunder based on the Fair Market Value of stock-based Awards, determined as of the Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long Term Incentive Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Establishment, Purpose, and Duration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Units, and Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Plan was originally adopted by the Board on February 24, 2009, became effective upon shareholder approval on April 28, 2009 and was subsequently amended, effective as of April 27, 2010, January 25, 2011 and October 23, 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This amendment and restatement of the Plan was adopted by the Board on January 28, 2014 and shall become effective upon shareholder approval on April 22, 2014 (the Effective Date) and shall remain in effect as provided in Section 1.3 hereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1.2 Purpose of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of this Plan is to provide a means whereby Employees develop personal involvement in the financial success of the Company, and to encourage them to devote their best efforts to the business of the Company, thereby advancing the interests of the Company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A further purpose of this Plan is to provide a means through which the Company may attract and retain able Employees and to provide a means whereby those individuals can acquire and maintain stock ownership, thereby strengthening their concern for the welfare of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Plan also provides a means of compensating Directors in the form of equity as a complement to other elements of the Directors overall compensation program and to align their interests with those of the Companys shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1.3 Duration of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless sooner terminated as provided herein, this Plan shall terminate April 22, 2024.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After this Plan is terminated, no Awards may be granted but Awards previously granted shall remain outstanding in accordance with their applicable terms and conditions and this Plans terms and conditions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Definitions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whenever used in this Plan, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below, and when the meaning is intended, the initial letter of the word shall be capitalized.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.1 Acquisition Awards has the meaning set forth in Section 4.2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.2 Administrator has the meaning set forth in Section 3.4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.3 Award means, individually or collectively, a grant under this Plan of Nonqualified Stock Options, Incentive Stock Options, SARs, Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Units, or Other Stock-Based Awards, in each case subject to the terms of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.4 Award Agreement means either
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) a written agreement entered into by the Company and a Participant setting forth the terms and provisions applicable to an Award granted under this Plan, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) a written or electronic statement issued by the Company to a Participant describing the terms and provisions of such Award, including any amendment or modification thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may provide for the use of electronic, Internet or other non-paper Award Agreements, and the use of electronic, Internet or other non-paper means for the acceptance thereof and actions thereunder by a Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.5 Beneficial Owner or Beneficial Ownership shall have the meaning ascribed to such term in Rule 13d-3 of the General Rules and Regulations under the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.6 Board means the Board of Directors of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control means the occurrence of any one of the following events with respect to the Company:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) individuals who, on January 1, 2014, constitute the Board (the Incumbent Directors) cease, for any reason, to constitute at least a majority of the Board, provided that any person becoming a director subsequent to January 1, 2014, whose election or nomination for election was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the Incumbent Directors then on the Board (either by a specific vote or by approval of the Company proxy statement in which such person is named as a nominee for director, without objection to such nomination) shall be an Incumbent Director; provided, however, that no individual elected or nominated as a director of the Company initially as a result of an actual or threatened election contest with respect to directors or any other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of any person other than the Board shall be deemed an Incumbent Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any person (as such term is defined in Section 3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a)(9) of the Exchange Act and as used in Sections 13(d)(3) and 14(d)(2) of the Exchange Act) is or becomes a Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of securities of the Company representing 20% or more of the combined voting power of the Companys then outstanding securities eligible to vote for the election of the Board (the Praxair Voting Securities); provided, however, that the event described in this Subsection 2.7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) shall not be deemed to be a Change in Control by virtue of any of the following acquisitions: (A) by the Company or any of its subsidiaries; (B) by any employee benefit plan sponsored or maintained by the Company or any of its subsidiaries; (C) by any underwriter temporarily holding securities pursuant to an offering of such securities; or (D) pursuant to a Non-Qualifying Transaction (as defined in Subsection 2.7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) the consummation of a merger, consolidation, statutory share exchange or similar form of corporate transaction involving the Company or any of its subsidiaries that requires the approval of the Companys stockholders, whether for such transaction or the issuance of securities in the transaction (a Business Combination), unless immediately following such Business Combination: (A) more than 50% of the total voting power of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x) the corporation resulting from such Business Combination (the Surviving Corporation), or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (y) if applicable, the ultimate parent corporation that directly or indirectly has Beneficial Ownership of 100% of the voting securities eligible to elect directors of the Surviving Corporation (the Parent Corporation), is represented by Praxair Voting Securities that were outstanding immediately prior to such Business Combination (or, if applicable, shares into which such Praxair Voting Securities were converted pursuant to such Business Combination), and such voting power among the holders thereof is in substantially the same proportion as the voting power of such Praxair Voting Securities among the holders thereof immediately prior to the Business Combination, (B) no person (other than any employee benefit plan sponsored or maintained by the Surviving Corporation or the Parent Corporation), is or becomes the Beneficial Owner, directly or indirectly, of 20% or more of the total voting power of the outstanding voting securities eligible to elect directors of the Parent Corporation (or, if there is no Parent Corporation, the Surviving Corporation) and (C) at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of the Parent Corporation (or, if there is no Parent Corporation, the Surviving Corporation) were Incumbent Directors at the time of the Boards approval of the execution of the initial agreement providing for such Business Combination (any Business Combination which satisfies all of the criteria specified in (A), (B) and (C) above shall be deemed to be a Non-Qualifying Transaction); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) the stockholders of the Company approve a plan of complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company or a sale or disposition of all or substantially all of the Companys assets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, to the extent an Award is subject to Code Section 409A, the Committee shall have the discretion to define Change in Control for such Award in a manner which complies with such Code Section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.8 Code means the U.S. Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of this Plan, references to sections of the Code shall be deemed to include references to any applicable regulations thereunder and any successor or similar provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.9 Committee means, with respect to Awards granted to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Employees, the Compensation and Management Development Committee of the Board, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Directors, the Governance and Nominating
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-4   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee of the Board, and in each case, any other committee designated by the Board to administer this Plan with respect to Employee or Director Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee shall consist of not less than two directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if a member of the Committee is not an outside director within the meaning of Code Section 162(m) or is not a non-employee director within the meaning of Rule 16b-3 under the Exchange Act, the Committee may, from time to time, delegate some or all of its functions under the Plan to a committee or subcommittee composed of members that meet the relevant requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term Committee includes any such committee or subcommittee, to the extent of the Compensation and Management Development Committees delegation, or the Governance and Nominating Committees delegation, as the case may be.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Committee does not exist or cannot function for any reason, the Board may take any action under the Plan that would otherwise be the responsibility of the Committee, other than any actions required to be carried out by a committee of at least two outside directors or non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.10 Company means Praxair, Inc., a Delaware corporation, and any successor thereto as provided in Article 18 herein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.11 Covered Employee means any Employee who is or may become a Covered Employee, as defined in Code Section 162(m), and who is designated, either as an individual Employee or class of Employees, by the Committee within the shorter of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) ninety (90) days after the beginning of the Performance Period, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the period prior to the date twenty-five percent (25%) of the Performance Period has elapsed, as a Covered Employee under this Plan for such applicable Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.12 Director means any director of the Company who is not an Employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.13 Effective Date has the meaning set forth in Section 1.1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.14 Employee means any individual performing services for the Company or a Subsidiary and designated as an employee of the Company or its Subsidiaries on the payroll records thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An Employee shall not include any individual during any period he or she is classified or treated by the Company or its Subsidiary as an independent contractor, a consultant, or any employee of an employment, consulting, or temporary agency or any other entity other than the Company or its Subsidiary, without regard to whether such individual is subsequently determined to have been, or is subsequently retroactively reclassified as a common-law employee of the Company or its Subsidiary during such period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.15 Exchange Act means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended from time to time, or any successor act thereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.16 Fair Market Value or FMV means, in respect of any date on or as of which a determination thereof is being or to be made, the closing market price of a Share reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Transactions tape on such date, or, if no Shares were traded on such date, on the next preceding day on which sales of Shares were reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Transactions tape.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.17 Grant Date means the date an Award is granted to a Participant pursuant to the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.18 Grant Price means the price established at the time of grant of a SAR pursuant to Article 7, used to determine whether there is any payment due upon exercise of the SAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.19 Incentive Stock Option or ISO means an Option to purchase Shares granted under Article 6 to an Employee that is designated as an Incentive Stock Option and that is intended to meet the requirements of Code Section 422, or any successor provision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.20 Insider shall mean an individual who is, on the relevant date, an executive officer of the Company or a more than ten percent (10%) Beneficial Owner of any class of the Companys equity securities that is registered pursuant to Section 12 of the Exchange Act, as determined by the Board in accordance with Section 16 of the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.21 Market Price means, in respect of any date on or as of which a determination thereof is being or to be made, the average of the high and low prices of a Share reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Transactions tape on such date, or, if no Shares were traded on such date, on the next preceding day on which sales of Shares were reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Transactions tape.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.22 Nonqualified Stock Option or NQSO means an Option that is not intended to meet the requirements of Code Section 422, or that otherwise does not meet such requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.23 Officer means an Employee who is either
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) an executive officer (within the meaning of Rule 3b-7 of the Exchange Act), or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) an officer elected by the Board and holding a position with a Company salary level of 18 or higher (or the future equivalent thereof).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.24 Option means an Incentive Stock Option or a Nonqualified Stock Option, as described in Article 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.25 Option Price means the price at which a Share may be purchased by a Participant pursuant to an Option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.26 Other Stock-Based Award means an equity-based or equity-related Award not otherwise described by the terms of this Plan, granted pursuant to Article 10.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.27 Participant means any Employee or a Director to whom an Award is granted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.28 Performance-Based Compensation means compensation under an Award that is intended to satisfy the requirements of Code Section 162(m) for certain performance-based compensation paid to Covered Employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Award granted hereunder that is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation within the meaning of Code Section 162(m) shall be subject to the terms and provisions of this Plan and not the Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan for Determining Performance- Based Awards Under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.29 Performance Goal means, with respect to any applicable Award to an Employee, the one or more targets, goals or levels of attainment required to be achieved in terms of the specified Performance Measures during the specified Performance Period, as set forth in the related Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.30 Performance Measures means:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) with respect to any Award to an Employee intended to qualify as Performance-Based Compensation, any one or more of the measures described in Article 12 on which the Performance Goals are based and which are approved by the Companys shareholders pursuant to this Plan in order to qualify Awards as Performance-Based Compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) with respect to any other Award, such performance measures as determined by the Committee in its sole discretion and set forth in the applicable Award Agreement for purposes of determining the applicable Performance Goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.31 Performance Period means the period of time during which the Performance Goals must be met in order to determine the degree of payout and/or vesting with respect to an Award granted to an Employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.32 Performance Unit means an Award to an Employee under Article 9 herein and subject to the terms of this Plan, denominated in Units, the value of which at the time it is payable is determined as a function of the extent to which corresponding Performance Goal(s) has been achieved during the applicable Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.33 Plan means this Amended and Restated 2009 Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long Term Incentive Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.34 Restricted Stock means Shares issued pursuant to a Restricted Stock Grant under Article 8, so long as the Shares remain subject to the restrictions and conditions specified in the Award Agreement pursuant to which such Restricted Stock Grant is made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.35 Restricted Stock Grant means an Award of Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Units made pursuant to the provisions of Article 8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.36 Restricted Stock Unit means a Unit issued pursuant to a Restricted Stock Grant under Article 8 so long as the Units remain subject to the restrictions and conditions specified in the Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.37 Restriction Period means the period when Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Units are subject to a substantial risk of forfeiture (based on the passage of time, the achievement of Performance Goals, or upon the occurrence of other events as determined by the Committee, in its discretion), as provided in Article 8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-6   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
