sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.38 Share means a share of common stock of the Company, $0.01 par value per share or any security issued by the Company in substitution or exchange therefor or in lieu thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.39 Share Equivalent means a Unit (or fraction thereof, if authorized by the Committee) substantially equivalent to a hypothetical Share, credited to the Participant and having a value at any time equal to the FMV of a Share (or fraction thereof) at such time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.40 Stock Appreciation Right or SAR means an Award, designated as a SAR, pursuant to the terms of Article 7 herein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.41 Subsidiary means any corporation or other entity, whether domestic or foreign, in which the Company has or obtains, directly or indirectly, a proprietary interest of fifty percent (50%) or greater by reason of stock ownership or otherwise; provided, however, that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) for purposes of determining whether any Employee can be a Participant with respect to any Award of Incentive Stock Option, the term Subsidiary has the meaning given to such term in Code Section 424, as interpreted by the regulations thereunder and applicable law; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) for purposes of determining whether any individual may be a Participant with respect to any Award of Options or SARs that are intended to be exempt from Code Section 409A, the term Subsidiary means any corporation or other entity to which the Company is an eligible issuer of service recipient stock within the meaning of Code Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2.42 Unit means a bookkeeping entry used by the Company to record and account for the grant or settlement of an Award until such time as the Award is paid, canceled, forfeited or terminated, as the case may be, which, except as otherwise specified by the Committee, shall be equal to one Share Equivalent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3.1 General.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee shall be responsible for administering this Plan, subject to this Article 3 and the other provisions of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may employ attorneys, consultants, accountants, agents, and other individuals, any of whom may be an Employee, and the Committee, the Company, and its officers and Directors shall be entitled to rely upon the advice, opinions, or valuations of any such individuals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All actions taken and all interpretations and determinations made by the Committee shall be final and binding upon the Participants, the Company, and all other nterested individuals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3.2 Authority of the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee shall have full and exclusive discretionary power to interpret the terms and the intent of this Plan and any Award Agreement or other agreement or document ancillary to, or in connection with, this Plan, to determine eligibility for Awards and to adopt such rules, regulations, forms, instruments, and guidelines for administering this Plan as the Committee may deem necessary or proper.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such authority shall include, but not be limited to,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) selecting Participants,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) establishing all Award terms and conditions, including the terms and conditions set forth in Award Agreements,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) granting Awards as an alternative to or as the form of payment for grants or rights earned or due under compensation plans or arrangements of the Company,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) construing any ambiguous provision of the Plan or any Award Agreement,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) determining whether, to what extent and under what circumstances and method or methods (1) Awards may be (A) settled in cash, Shares, other securities, other Awards or other property, (B) exercised or (C) canceled, forfeited or suspended, (2) Shares, other securities, other Awards or other property, and other amounts payable with respect to an Award may be deferred either automatically or at the election of the Participant thereof or of the Committee, and (3) Awards may be settled by the Company or any of its designees, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) subject to Article 16 adopting modifications and amendments to this Plan or any Award Agreement, including, without limitation, any that are necessary to comply with the laws, rules or regulations of the countries and other jurisdictions in which the Company and/or its Subsidiaries operate or to accelerate the time or times at which the Award becomes vested, unrestricted or may be exercised.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3.3 Delegation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may delegate to one or more of its members or to one or more officers of the Company, and/or its Subsidiaries or to one or more agents or advisors, such administrative duties or powers as it may deem advisable, and the Committee or any individuals to whom it has delegated duties or powers as aforesaid may employ one or more individuals to render advice with respect to any responsibility the Committee or such individuals may have under this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may, by resolution, authorize the Chief Executive Officer of the Company (the CEO) or any other officer of the Company, to do one or both of the following on the same basis as can the Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) designate Employees to be recipients of Awards and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) determine the size of any such Awards; provided, however, (i) the Committee shall not delegate such
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: responsibilities for any Awards to be granted to an Employee who is considered an Insider;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the resolution providing such authorization sets forth the total number of Awards the CEO or officer may grant; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the CEO or officer, as applicable, shall report periodically to the Committee regarding the nature and scope of the Awards granted pursuant to the authority delegated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3.4 Indemnification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No member of the Committee or any person to whom administrative duties or powers have been delegated in accordance with Section 3.3 (each, an Administrator) will have any liability to any person (including any Participant) for any action taken or omitted or any determination made in good faith with respect to the Plan or any Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Administrator will be indemnified and held harmless by the Company against and from any loss, cost, liability or expense (including attorneys fees) that may be imposed upon or incurred by such Administrator in connection with or resulting from any action, suit or proceeding to which such Administrator may be a party or in which such Administrator may be involved by reason of any action taken or omitted to be taken under the Plan or any Award Agreement and against and from any and all amounts paid by such Administrator, with the Companys approval, in settlement thereof, or paid by such Administrator in satisfaction of any judgment in any such action, suit or proceeding against such Administrator, provided that the Company will have the right, at its own expense, to assume and defend any such action, suit or proceeding and, once the Company gives notice of its intent to assume the defense, the Company will have sole control over such defense with counsel of the Companys choice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent any taxable expense reimbursement under this paragraph is subject to Section 409A of the Code,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the amount thereof eligible in one taxable year shall not affect the amount eligible in any other taxable year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) in no event shall any expenses be reimbursed after the last day of the taxable year following the taxable year in which the Administrator incurred such expenses; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) in no event shall any right to reimbursement be subject to liquidation or exchange for another benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing right of indemnification will not be available to an Administrator to the extent that a court of competent jurisdiction in a final judgment or other final adjudication, in either case, not subject to further appeal, determines that the acts or omissions of such Administrator giving rise to the indemnification claim resulted from such Administrators bad faith, fraud or willful misconduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing right of indemnification will not be exclusive of any other rights of indemnification to which an Administrator may be entitled under the Companys certificate of incorporation or by-laws, as a matter of law, or otherwise, or any other power that the Company may have to indemnify such persons or hold them harmless.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares Subject to this Plan and Maximum Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.1 Number of Shares Available for Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to adjustment as provided in Section 4.5, the total number of Shares that may be issued pursuant to Awards under this Plan on or after April 25, 2017 (the Amendment Effective Date) is 8,000,000 Shares, plus the number of authorized Shares remaining available from the 8,000,000 Shares authorized for grant under the terms of this Plan immediately prior to the Amendment Effective Date and any additional Shares that become available for issuance under the Plan in accordance with Section 4.2 (including, for the avoidance of doubt, under Awards granted under this Plan prior to the Amendment Effective Date) (the Share Authorization).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Shares available for issuance under this Plan may be authorized and unissued Shares or treasury Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of Shares of the Share Authorization that may be issued pursuant to ISOs under this Plan following the Amendment Effective Date shall be 8,000,000 Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The maximum number of Shares of the Share Authorization that may be issued under this Plan pursuant to Awards other than Options or SARs following the Amendment Effective Date shall be 2,600,000 Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.2 Share Usage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares subject to an Award that expires according to its terms or is forfeited, terminated, canceled or surrendered, in each case, without having been exercised or settled, or can be paid only in cash, will be available again for grant under the Plan, without reducing the number of Shares that are available for Awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no event shall
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) any Shares subject to an Option that is cancelled upon the exercise of a tandem SAR,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any Shares subject to an Award that are surrendered in payment of the exercise price of an Option or in payment of the taxes associated with an Award,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) any Shares subject to a SAR that are not issued in connection with the stock settlement of the SAR upon exercise thereof, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) any Shares repurchased by the Company using Option proceeds, become available for grant under the Plan pursuant to this Section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares subject to awards that are assumed, converted or substituted under the Plan as a result of the Companys acquisition of another company (including by way of merger, combination or similar transaction) (Acquisition Awards) will not count against the Share Authorization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Available shares under a stockholder approved plan of an acquired company (as appropriately adjusted to reflect the transaction) may be used for Awards under the Plan and do not reduce the Share Authorization, subject to applicable stock exchange requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in no event shall Shares underlying
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-8   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: any underwater Option that is voluntarily surrendered by a Participant become available for grant under the Plan pursuant hereto.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.3 Annual Award Limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following limits (each an Annual Award Limit and, collectively, Annual Award Limits), as adjusted pursuant to Section 4.5, shall apply to grants of Awards to Employees under this Plan, whether or not such Awards are intended to qualify as Performance-Based Compensation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Options and SARS: The maximum aggregate number of Shares subject to Options, SARs or any combination thereof granted in any one calendar year to any one Participant shall be 2,000,000 (with tandem Options and SARs being counted only once with respect to this limit).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Other Awards Intended to be Performance-Based Compensation: The maximum aggregate number of Shares subject to Awards of Restricted Stock, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Units or Other Stock-Based Compensation that are intended to be Performance-Based Compensation granted in any one calendar year to any one Participant shall be 300,000 Shares or, in the event such Award is payable in cash, the equivalent cash value thereof on the first day of the performance period to which such Award relates, as determined by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.4 Director Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to retain and compensate Directors for their services, and to strengthen the alignment of their interests with those of the shareholders of the Company, the Plan permits the grant of stock-based awards to Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aggregate compensation (including Awards) to any one Director in respect of any calendar year, solely with respect to his or her service as a Director, may not exceed $750,000, with the value of any Awards hereunder based on the Fair Market Value of stock-based Awards, determined as of the Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4.5 Adjustments in Authorized Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of any corporate event or transaction such as a merger, consolidation, reorganization, recapitalization, separation, partial or complete liquidation, stock dividend, other distribution of cash or property (other than normal cash dividends) to shareholders of the Company, stock split, reverse stock split, split up, spin-off, combination of Shares, exchange of Shares, dividend in kind, or other like change in capital structure affecting the number or type of outstanding Shares, the Committee, in order to prevent dilution or enlargement of Participants rights under this Plan, shall substitute or adjust, as applicable, the number and kind of Shares that may be issued under this Plan or under particular forms of Awards, the number and kind of Shares subject to outstanding Awards (including, without limitation, the substitution of other securities, cash or property in lieu thereof), the Option Price or Grant Price applicable to outstanding Awards, the Annual Award Limits, and other value determinations applicable to outstanding Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To further reflect any of the foregoing events, transactions or adjustments, the Committee, in its sole discretion, may also make adjustments in the terms of any Awards under this Plan and may modify any other terms of outstanding Awards, ncluding modifications of Performance Goals and changes in the length of Performance Periods, as it deems necessary or appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The determination of the Committee as to the foregoing adjustments, if any, shall be conclusive and binding on Participants under this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the provisions of Article 16 and notwithstanding anything else herein to the contrary, without affecting the number of Shares reserved or available hereunder, the Committee may authorize the issuance or assumption of benefits under this Plan in connection with any merger, consolidation, acquisition of property or stock, or reorganization upon such terms and conditions as it may deem appropriate (including, but not limited to, a conversion of equity awards into Awards under this Plan in a manner consistent with FASB ASC Topic 718).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility and Participation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only Employees and Directors shall be eligible to participate in this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the provisions of this Plan, the designated Committee may, from time to time, select those Employees or Directors to whom Awards shall be granted and shall determine, in its sole discretion, the nature of, any and all terms permissible by law, and the amount of each Award; provided, however, that no Award made to a Director shall be subject to or conditioned upon the attainment of any Performance Goal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 6.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Options
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.1 Grant of Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms and provisions of this Plan, Options may be granted to Participants in such number, and upon such terms, and at any time and from time to time as shall be determined by the Committee, in its sole discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options may be granted in addition to, or in tandem with or independent of, SARs or any other Awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.2 Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Option grant shall be evidenced by an Award Agreement that shall specify the Option Price, the term of the Option, the number of Shares to which the Option pertains, the conditions, including any Performance Goals, upon which an Option shall become vested and exercisable, and such other terms and conditions as the Committee shall determine which are not inconsistent with the terms of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Award Agreement also shall specify whether the Option is intended to be an ISO or an NQSO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent that an Award Agreement does not specify whether the Option is intended to be an ISO or an NQSO, such Option shall be an NQSO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.3 Option Price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Option Price for each grant of an Option under this Plan shall be determined by the Committee in its sole discretion and shall be specified in the Award Agreement; provided, however, the Option Price (other than the Option Price of Acquisition Awards) must be at least equal to 100% of the FMV of the Shares as determined on the Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.4 Term of Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Option granted to a Participant shall expire at such time as the Committee shall determine at the time of grant; provided, however, no Option shall be exercisable later than the day before the tenth (10th) anniversary of its Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.5 Exercise of Options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options granted under this Article 6 shall be exercisable at such times and be subject to such restrictions and conditions as the Committee shall in each instance approve, which terms and restrictions need not be the same for each grant or for each Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except upon a Change in Control and in certain limited situations (including, but not limited to, the death or disability of the Participant):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Awards of Options subject solely to the continued service of the Participant shall become exercisable no earlier than three (3) years after the Grant Date, provided that such Option may partially vest after no less than one (1) year following such Grant Date; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any other Award of Options shall become exercisable no earlier than one (1) year after the Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.6 Payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options granted under this Article 6 shall be exercised by the delivery of a notice of exercise to the Company or an agent designated by the Company in a form specified or accepted by the Committee, or by complying with any alternative procedures which may be authorized by the Committee, setting forth the number of Shares with respect to which the Option is to be exercised, accompanied by full payment for the Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A condition of the issuance of the Shares as to which an Option shall be exercised shall be the payment of the Option Price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Option Price of any Option shall be payable to the Company in full either:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) in cash or its equivalent;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) by tendering (either by actual delivery or attestation) previously acquired Shares having an aggregate Market Price at the time of exercise equal to the Option Price (provided that the Shares that are tendered may be subject to a minimum holding period, as determined by the Committee in its discretion, prior to their tender to satisfy the Option Price if acquired under this Plan or any other compensation plan maintained by the Company or have been purchased on the open market);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) by having the Company withhold Shares that otherwise would be delivered to the exerciser pursuant to the exercise of the Option having a value equaling the aggregate Option Price due;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) by a cashless (broker-assisted) exercise;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) by a combination of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) and/or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d); or (f) any other method approved or accepted by the Committee in its sole discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to any governing rules or regulations, as soon as practicable after receipt of written notification of exercise and full payment (including satisfaction of any applicable tax withholding), the Company shall deliver to the Participant evidence of book entry Shares, or upon the Participants request, Share certificates in an appropriate amount based upon the number of Shares purchased under the Option(s).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise determined by the Committee, all payments under all of the methods indicated above shall be paid in United States dollars.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6.7 Notification of Disqualifying Disposition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any Participant shall make any disposition of Shares issued pursuant to the exercise of an ISO under the circumstances described in Code Section 421(b) (relating
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-10   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to certain disqualifying dispositions), such Participant shall notify the Company of such disposition within ten (10) days thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 7.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Appreciation Rights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.1 Grant of SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Plan, SARs may be granted to Participants at any time and from time to time as shall be determined by the Committee, in its sole discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Plan, the Committee shall have complete discretion in determining the number of SARs granted to each Participant and, consistent with the provisions of this Plan, in determining the terms and conditions pertaining to such SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SARs may be granted under the Plan alone, in tandem with, in addition to or independent of, Options or any other Awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.2 SAR Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each SAR Award shall be evidenced by an Award Agreement that shall specify the Grant Price, the term of the SAR, the number of Shares to which the SAR pertains, the conditions, including any Performance Goals, upon which the SAR shall become vested and exercisable, and such other terms and conditions as the Committee shall determine, which are not inconsistent with the terms of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.3 Term of SAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term of a SAR granted under this Plan shall be determined by the Committee, in its sole discretion, and specified in the SAR Award Agreement; provided, however, no SAR shall be exercisable later than the tenth (10th) anniversary of its Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.4 Grant Price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Grant Price for each Award of a SAR shall be determined by the Committee and shall be specified in the Award Agreement; provided, however, the Grant Price must be at least equal to 100% of the FMV of the Shares as determined on the Grant Date (other than the Grant Price of Acquisition Awards).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7.5 Exercise of SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SARs granted under this Article 7 shall be exercisable at such times and be subject to such restrictions and conditions as the Committee shall in each instance approve, which terms and restrictions need not be the same for each grant or for each Participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except upon a Change in Control and in certain limited situations (including, but not limited to, the death or disability of the Participant):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Awards of SARs subject solely to the continued service of the Participant shall become exercisable no earlier than three (3) years after the Grant Date provided that such SAR may partially vest after no less than one (1) year following such Grant Date; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any other Award of SARs shall become exercisable no earlier than one (1) year after the Grant Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may provide that a SAR shall be automatically exercised on one or more specified dates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: .6 Payment of SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the exercise of a SAR, a Participant shall be entitled to receive payment from the Company in an amount determined by multiplying:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) The excess of the FMV of a Share on the date of exercise over the Grant Price; by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) The number of Shares with respect to which the SAR is exercised.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the discretion of the Committee, the payment upon exercise of a SAR may be in cash, Shares, or any combination thereof, or in any other manner approved by the Committee in its sole discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees determination regarding the form of SAR payout shall be set forth in the Award Agreement pertaining to the grant of the SAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 8.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Grants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.1 Grant of Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms and provisions of this Plan, the Committee, at any time and from time to time, may grant Restricted Stock Grants to Participants in such amounts as the Committee shall determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Restricted Stock Grant is the issue of Shares or Units in the name of a Participant subject to such terms and conditions as the Committee shall deem appropriate, including, without limitation, restrictions on the sale, assignment, transfer or other disposition of such Shares or Units and the requirement that the Participant forfeit such Shares or Units back to the Company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) upon termination of employment of an Employee or termination of service as a Director for specified reasons within a specified period of time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) if any specified Performance Goals are not achieved during a specified Performance Period; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) if such other conditions as the Committee may specify are not satisfied.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.2 Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Unit Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Restricted Stock Grant shall be evidenced by an Award Agreement that shall specify the Restriction Period(s), the number of Shares of Restricted Stock and/or Restricted Stock Units granted, the conditions and restrictions imposed upon the Restricted Stock Grant, and such other provisions as the Committee shall determine which are not inconsistent with the terms of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.3 Restriction Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Restricted Stock Grant shall provide that in order for a Participant to receive unrestricted Shares or payment in settlement of a Restricted Stock Unit, the Participant must remain an Employee or a Director, as the case may be, for a period of time specified by the Committee in the Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may also establish one or more Performance Goals that are required to be achieved during one or more Performance Periods within the Restriction Period as a condition to the lapse of restrictions of Awards to Employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except upon a Change in Control and in certain limited situations (including, but not limited to, the death or disability of the Participant): (a) Except as provided in clause
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) of this Section 8.3, Awards of Restricted Stock and/or Restricted Stock Units subject solely to the continued service of the Participant shall have a Restriction Period of not less than three (3) years from the Grant Date;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Awards to Employees of Restricted Stock and/or Restricted Stock Units subject to the achievement of one or more Performance Goals shall have a minimum Restriction Period of one (1) year; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) Awards of Restricted Stock and/or Restricted Stock Units subject solely to the continued service of a Director shall have such Restriction Period as the Committee shall determine; provided, however, that the aggregate number of Shares subject to Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Unit Awards granted to Directors under clause
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) of this Section 8.3 with a vesting period of less than three (3) years shall not exceed five percent (5%) of the 2,600,000 Share Authorization under Section 4.1 of this Plan applicable to Awards other than Options or SARs, as may be adjusted from time to time pursuant to the provisions of this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may provide for the lapse of restrictions in installments during the Restriction Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.4 Restrictions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the Restriction Period, the Participant may not sell, assign, transfer, pledge, hypothecate, encumber or otherwise dispose of or realize on the Shares or Units subject to the Restricted Stock Grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise directed by the Committee,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) all certificates representing Shares of Restricted Stock will be held in custody by the Company until all restrictions thereon have lapsed, together with a stock power or powers executed by the Participant in whose name such certificates are registered, endorsed in blank and covering such Shares, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) all uncertificated Shares of Restricted Stock will be held at the Companys transfer agent in book entry form with appropriate restrictions relating to the transfer of such Shares of Restricted Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may, in its sole discretion, include such other restrictions and conditions as it may deem appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.5 Payment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to Section 12.4 below, if applicable, upon expiration of the Restriction Period and if all conditions have been satisfied and any applicable Performance Goals attained, the Shares of Restricted Stock will be made available to the Participant or the Restricted Stock Units will be vested in the account of the Participant, free of all restrictions, provided that the Committee may, in its discretion, require
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the further deferral of any Restricted Stock Grant beyond the initially specified Restriction Period;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) that the Restricted Stock or Restricted Stock Units be retained by the Company; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) that the Participant receive a cash payment in lieu of unrestricted Shares or Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.6 Rights as a Shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise determined by the Committee and set forth in a Participants Award Agreement, the Participant shall have, with respect to shares of Restricted Stock, all of the rights of a shareholder of the Company, including the right to vote the shares and receive any dividends paid thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such dividends shall be reinvested on the dividend payment date in additional Shares of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-12   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock under the Restricted Stock Grant and shall be subject to the restrictions and other terms and conditions set forth therein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Participant shall not have, with respect to Restricted Stock Units, any voting or other rights of a shareholder of the Company; provided, however, that if determined by the Committee and set forth in the Participants Award Agreement, the Participant shall have the right to receive Dividend Equivalents in accordance with the provisions o Article 13.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.7 Section 83(b) Election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may provide in an Award Agreement that the Award of Restricted Stock is conditioned upon the Participant making or refraining from making an election with respect to the Award under Code Section 83(b).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a Participant makes an election pursuant to Code Section 83(b) concerning a Restricted Stock Award, the Participant shall be required to file promptly a copy of such election with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8.8 Restricted Stock Grants Intended to be Performance-Based Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Grant that is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation shall also be subject to the terms and conditions of Article 12 below and the termination provisions in the Award Agreement shall comply with the requirements of Code Section 162(m) (including any regulations, rulings, notices and procedures thereunder).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 9.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.1 Grant of Performance Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms and provisions of this Plan, the Committee, at any time and from time to time, may grant Performance Units to Employees in such amounts and upon such terms as the Committee shall determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Performance Unit shall represent the prospective contingent right to receive payment based upon Company and/or Subsidiary performance over a specified Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Performance Unit shall have an initial value that is established by the Committee at the time of grant and need not be equivalent to the value of a Share Equivalent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of grant, the Committee, in its sole discretion, shall establish the Performance Period, Performance Measures, Performance Goals and such other terms and conditions applicable to such Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of Shares and/or the amount of cash or other consideration earned in settlement of a Performance Unit shall be determined at the end of the Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Performance Unit that is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation shall also be subject to the terms and conditions of Article 12 below and the termination provisions in the Award Agreement shall comply with the requirements of Code Section 162(m) (including any regulations, rulings, notices and procedures thereunder).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.2 Earning of Performance Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Performance Unit Award Agreement shall provide that in order for an Employee to receive a payment in settlement of the Award, the Company must achieve certain Performance Goals over a designated Performance Period, with attainment of one or more Performance Goals determined using one or more specific Performance Measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Performance Goals and the Performance Period shall be established by the Committee in its sole discretion; provided, however, that except upon a Change in Control and in certain limited situations (including, but not limited to, the death or disability of the Participant), the Performance Period must have a minimum duration of one (1) year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee shall establish one or more Performance Measures for each Performance Period for determining the portion of the Performance Unit Award, which will be earned or forfeited, based on the extent to which the Performance Goals are achieved or exceeded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such Performance Goals may include minimum, maximum and target levels of performance, with the size of the payment payable in settlement of the Performance Unit Award based on the level attained.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.3 Form of Performance Unit Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Unit Awards shall be made on such terms and conditions not inconsistent with the Plan, and in such form or forms, as the Committee may, from time to time, approve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Units may be awarded alone, in addition to, or independent of other Awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms of the Plan, the Committee shall, in its discretion, determine the number of Units subject to each Performance Unit Award made to an Employee and may impose different terms and conditions on any particular Performance Unit Award made to any Employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Performance Goals, Performance Period or Periods, Performance Measures and other terms and conditions applicable to any Performance Unit Award shall be set forth in the relevant Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.4 Payment of Performance Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms of this Plan and the applicable Award Agreement, after the later of the date the applicable Performance Period has ended or the date on which any other terms and conditions applicable to such Performance Unit Award have been satisfied, the holder of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Units shall be entitled to receive payout of the value and number of Performance Units earned by the Employee over the Performance Period, to be determined as a function of the extent to which the corresponding Performance Goals have been achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to Section 12.4 below, if applicable, such payment shall be as determined by the Committee and as evidenced in the Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to the terms of this Plan, the Committee, in its sole discretion, may pay earned Performance Units in the form of Shares, cash, any combination thereof, or any other form as designated by the Committee in its sole discretion, equal to the value of the earned Performance Units at the close of the applicable Performance Period, or at such other time as specified in the Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Shares paid in settlement of such Performance Units may be granted subject to any restrictions deemed appropriate by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The determination of the Committee with respect to the form of payout of such Awards shall be set forth in the applicable Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 10.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Stock-Based Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10.1 Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may grant other types of equity-based or equity-related Awards not otherwise described by the terms of this Plan (including, subject to the limitations below, the grant or offer for sale of unrestricted Shares) in such amounts and subject to such terms and conditions, as the Committee shall determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such Awards may involve the transfer of actual Shares to Participants, or payment in cash or otherwise of amounts based on the value of Shares and may include, without limitation, Awards designed to comply with or take advantage of the applicable local laws of jurisdictions other than the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any provision in this Plan to the contrary, Awards of unrestricted Shares shall only be made in lieu of salary and/or cash bonuses/variable compensation paid to Employees or cash fees paid to Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10.2 Value of Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Other Stock-Based Award shall be expressed in terms of Shares or Units, as determined by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may, in its discretion, establish Performance Goals with respect to any Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Committee exercises its discretion to establish Performance Goals, the number and/or value of Other Stock-Based Awards that will be paid out to the Participant may depend on the extent to which the Performance Goals are met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10.3 Payment of Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment, if any, with respect to an Other Stock-Based Award shall be made in accordance with the terms of the Award, in cash or Shares as the Committee determines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10.4 Other Stock-Based Awards Intended to be Performance-Based Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Other Stock-Based Award that is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation shall also be subject to the terms and conditions of Article 12 below and the termination provisions in the Award Agreement shall comply with the requirements of Code Section 162(m) (including any regulations, rulings, notices and procedures thereunder).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 11.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transferability of Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Award under the Plan, and no right or interest therein, shall be
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) assignable, alienable, pledgable or transferable by a Participant, except by will or the laws of descent and distribution, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) subject to any obligation, or the lien or claims of any creditor, of any Participant, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) subject to any lien, encumbrance or claim of any party made in respect of or through any Participant, however arising.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the lifetime of a Participant, Options and SARs are exercisable only by, Shares issued upon the exercise of Options and SARs or in settlement of other Awards will be issued only to, and other payments in settlement of any Award will be payable only to, the Participant or his or her legal representative.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Committee may, in its sole discretion and on and subject to such terms and conditions as it shall deem appropriate, which terms and conditions shall be set forth in the related Award Agreement:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) authorize a Participant to transfer all or a portion of any Nonqualified Stock Option or SAR, as the case may be, granted to such Participant, provided that in no event shall any transfer be made to any person or persons other than such Participants spouse, children or grandchildren, or a trust or partnership for the exclusive benefit of one or more such persons, which transfer must be made as a gift and without any consideration; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) provide for the transferability of a particular grant or Award pursuant to a domestic relations order.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other transfers and any retransfer by any permitted transferee are prohibited and any such purported transfer shall be null and void.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Nonqualified Stock Option or SAR which becomes the subject of a permitted transfer (and the Participant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1-14   Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to whom it was granted by the Company) shall continue to be subject to the same terms and conditions as were in effect immediately prior to such permitted transfer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Participant shall remain responsible to the Company for the payment of all withholding taxes incurred as a result of any exercise of such Option or SAR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no event shall any permitted transfer of an Option, SAR or other grant or Award create any right in any party in respect of any Option, SAR or other grant or Award, other than the rights of the qualified transferee in respect of such Option, SAR or other Award specified in the related Award Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 12.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12.1 Performance Measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Performance Goals upon which the payment or vesting of an Award to a Covered Employee that is intended to qualify as Performance-Based Compensation shall be limited to the following Performance Measures:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Net earnings or net income (before or after taxes);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Earnings per share (basic or diluted);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) Net sales;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) Revenue growth;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) Operating profit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) Return measures (including, but not limited to, return on assets, capital, invested capital, equity, sales, or revenue);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) Cash flow (including, but not limited to, operating cash flow, free cash flow, cash flow return on equity, and cash flow return on investment);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h) Earnings before or after taxes, interest, depreciation, and/or amortization;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) Gross or operating margin
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (j) Productivity ratios;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (k) Share price (including, but not limited to, growth measures and total shareholder return);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (l) Expense targets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (m) Margins;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (n) Operating efficiency;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (o) Market share;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (p) Working capital targets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (q) Economic value added or EVA (net operating profit after tax minus the sum of capital multiplied by the cost of capital); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (r) Objective safety measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Performance Measure(s) may be used to measure the performance of the Company and/or its Subsidiary as a whole or any business unit of the Company and/or its Subsidiary or any combination thereof, as the Committee may deem appropriate, or any of the above Performance Measures as compared to the performance of a group of comparator companies, or published or special index that the Committee, in its sole discretion, deems appropriate, or the Committee may select Share price as a Performance Measure as compared to various stock market indices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also has
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the authority to provide in an Award
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Agreement for accelerated vesting of any Award based on the achievement of Performance Goals pursuant to the Performance Measures specified in this Article 12, subject to compliance with Section 162(m) of the Code, to the extent an Award is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise expressly provided in the Plan or an Award Agreement, all financial terms are used as defined under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles or such other objective accounting principles, as may be designated by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12.2 Establishment of the Performance Period, Performance Goals and Formula.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise required under applicable law, rule or regulation, a Participants Award that is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation shall be determined based on the attainment of written objective Performance Goals approved by the Committee for a Performance Period established by the Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) while the outcome for that Performance Period is substantially uncertain and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) no more than 90 days after the commencement of the Performance Period to which the Performance Goal relates or, if less, the number of days which is equal to 25% of the relevant Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the same time as the Performance Goals are established, the Committee will prescribe a formula to determine the amount of Performance-Based Compensation under the Award that may be payable based upon the level of attainment of the Performance Goals during the Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12.3 Evaluation of Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may provide at the time of any such Award that any evaluation of performance may include or exclude any of the following events that occurs during a Performance Period:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) asset write-downs and impairments;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) gain/loss on sale of assets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) litigation or claim judgments or settlements (including insurance proceeds);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) the effect of changes in tax laws, accounting principles, or other laws or provisions affecting reported results;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) any reorganization and restructuring programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) extraordinary nonrecurring items as described in FASB ASC Topic 105 (or such other applicable accounting principle, as may be designated by the Committee) and/or in managements discussion and analysis of financial condition and results of operations appearing in the Companys annual report to shareholders and/or other public filings for the applicable year;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) acquisitions or divestitures;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h) foreign exchange gains and losses; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the effect of any materially adverse and unforeseen market conditions beyond the control of the Company and its Subsidiaries, Employees, officers and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent such inclusions or exclusions affect Awards to Covered Employees that are intended to be Performance-Based Compensation, they shall be prescribed in a form that meets the requirements of Code Section 162(m) for deductibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12.4 Adjustment of Performance-Based Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Awards that are intended to qualify as Performance- Based Compensation may not be adjusted upward.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee shall retain the discretion to adjust such Awards downward, either on a formula or discretionary basis or any combination, as the Committee determines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 12.5 Committee Discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that the Committee determines that it is advisable to grant Awards that shall not qualify as Performance-Based Compensation, the Committee may make such grants without satisfying the requirements of Code Section 162(m) and base vesting on Performance Measures other than those set forth in Section 12.1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 13.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend Equivalents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Participant selected by the Committee may be granted dividend equivalents based on the dividends declared on Shares or Share Equivalents that are subject to any Award (other than Options and SARs), to be credited as of dividend payment dates, during the period between the date the Award is granted and the date the Award is exercised, vests, settled or expires, as determined by the Committee (Dividend Equivalents).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise provided in the Plan or the applicable Award Agreement, such Dividend Equivalents shall be converted to cash or additional Shares or Share Equivalents by such formula, at such time and subject to such limitations as may be determined by the Committee; provided, however, that in no event shall any Dividend Equivalents become payable earlier than the date on which the underlying Award becomes vested and payable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 14.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination of Employment or Service as a Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 14.1 Stock Options and SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Award Agreement shall set forth the extent to which the Participant shall have the right to exercise an Option or SAR following termination of, as the case may be,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) an Employees employment with the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) a Directors service as a director of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such provisions shall be determined in the sole discretion of the Committee, shall be included in the Award Agreement entered into with each Participant, need not be uniform among all Options and SARs issued under this Plan, and may reflect distinctions based on the reasons for termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 14.2 Restricted Stock Grant, Performance Units and Other Stock-Based Awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Award Agreement for each Restricted Stock Grant, Performance Unit and Other Stock-Based Award shall set forth the extent to which such Award shall vest and/or may be forfeited upon termination of, as the case may be,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the Employees employment with the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Directors service as a director of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such provisions shall be determined in the sole discretion of the Committee, shall be included in the Award Agreement entered into with each Participant, need not be uniform among all such Awards, and may reflect distinctions based on the reasons for termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, to the extent a Restricted Stock grant, Performance Unit or Other Stock-Based Award is intended to be Performance-Based Compensation, the termination provisions in the Award Agreement shall comply with the requirements of Code Section 162(m) (including any regulations, rulings, notices and procedures thereunder).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 15.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rights of Participants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 15.1 Employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nothing in this Plan or an Award Agreement shall interfere with or limit in any way the right of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries, to terminate any Employees employment at any time or for any reason not prohibited by law, nor confer upon any Employee any right to continue his employment, or upon any Director a right to continue to serve as a Director, for any specified period of time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Neither an Award nor any benefits arising under this Plan shall constitute an employment contract with the Company and/or its Subsidiaries for an Employee or a contract for service as a director with the Company for a Director and, accordingly, subject to Article 16, this Plan and the benefits hereunder may be terminated at any time in the sole and exclusive discretion of the Committee without giving rise to any liability on the part of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 15.2 Participation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No individual shall have the right to be selected to receive an Award under this Plan, or, having been so selected, to be selected to receive a future Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 15.3 Rights as a Shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except as otherwise provided herein, a Participant shall have none of the rights of a shareholder with respect to Shares covered by any Award until the Participant becomes the record holder of such Shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 16.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee, in its sole discretion, may specify in the applicable Award Agreement the effect, if any, of a Change in Control on any Award held by a Participant, including the adjustment or other treatment of Performance Goals; provided, however, that any such provision included in an Award Agreement granted to a Participant who is at the time an Officer shall specify that if
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a Change in Control occurs and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) within two (2) years thereafter (or such other period of time following the Change in Control specified in the applicable Award Agreement), such Officers employment with the Company (or an applicable Subsidiary) or any successor thereto is terminated without cause (as defined in the applicable Award Agreement) or if the Officer terminates employment for good reason (as defined in the applicable Award Agreement), then such Award shall become partially or fully vested (including the lapsing of restrictions and conditions) and, as applicable, exercisable as of the date of such termination of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Committee may, in its sole discretion, determine in connection with a Change in Control that any or all outstanding Awards granted under the Plan, whether or not exercisable, will be canceled and terminated and that in connection with such cancellation and termination, the holder of such Award may receive for each Share subject to such Awards a cash payment (or the delivery of shares of stock,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Praxair, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX 1: AMENDED AND RESTATED 2009 PRAXAIR, INC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: other securities or a combination of cash, stock and securities equivalent to such cash payment) equal to the difference, if any, between the consideration received by shareholders of the Company in respect of a Share in connection with such transaction and the purchase price per share, if any, under the Award, multiplied by the number of Shares subject to such Award; provided that if such product is zero or less, the Award will be canceled and terminated without payment therefor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 17.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amendment, Modification, Suspension, and Termination
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 17.1 Amendment, Modification, Suspension, and Termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to Section 17.2, the Board may, at any time and from time to time, alter, amend, modify, suspend, or terminate this Plan and any Award Agreement in whole or in part without approval of the Companys shareholders, unless such approval is necessary to comply with applicable laws, including the Exchange Act and the Code, or the rules and regulations of any securities exchange on which the Shares are listed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In no event may the Board amend the Plan without the prior approval of the Companys shareholders to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) increase the maximum number of Shares which may be issued pursuant to the Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) increase any limitation set forth in the Plan on the number of Shares which may be issued, or the aggregate value of Awards which may be made, in respect of any type of Award to any single Participant during any specified period;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) change the class of individuals eligible to participate in the Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) reduce the minimum Option Price or the minimum SAR Grant Price as set forth in Sections 6.3 and 7.4; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) reduce the minimum vesting period, Restriction Period or Performance Period requirements applicable to Awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, except as provided in Sections 4.5 and 16.1, in no event may the terms of a previously granted Option or SAR be amended to reduce its Option Price or Grant Price, as applicable, or to cancel the Award in exchange for cash or an Option, SAR, or other Award with an Option Price, Grant Price or other exercise price that is less than the Option Price or Grant Price, as applicable, of the original Option or SAR, without obtaining approval of the Companys shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 17.2 Awards Previously Granted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan to the contrary (other than Section 17.3), no termination, amendment, suspension, or modification of this Plan or an Award Agreement shall adversely affect in any material way any Award previously granted under this Plan, without the written consent of the Participant holding such Award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 17.3 Amendment to Conform to Law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan to the contrary, the Board may amend the Plan or an Award Agreement, to take effect retroactively or otherwise, as deemed necessary or advisable for the purpose of conforming the Plan or an Award Agreement to any present or future law relating to plans of this or similar nature and to the administrative regulations and rulings promulgated thereunder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By accepting an Award under this Plan, a Participant agrees to any amendment made pursuant to this Section 17.3 to any Award granted under the Plan without further consideration or action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 18.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax Withholding; No Liability with Respect to Tax Qualification or Adverse Tax Treatment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Awards under the Plan will be made subject to any applicable withholding for taxes of any kind.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall have the right to deduct from any amount payable under the Plan, including delivery of Shares to be made under the Plan, all federal, state, city, local or foreign taxes of any kind required by law to be withheld with respect to such payment and to take such other actions as may be necessary in the opinion of the Company to satisfy all obligations for the payment of such taxes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company shall have the right to require a Participant to pay cash to satisfy withholding taxes as a condition to the payment of any amount (whether in cash or Shares) under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, in no event shall the Company be liable to a Participant on account of an Awards failure to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) qualify for favorable United States or foreign tax treatment or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) avoid adverse tax treatment under United States or foreign law, including, without limitation, Section 409A of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Article 19.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Successors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All obligations of the Company under this Plan with respect to Awards granted hereunder shall be binding on any successor to the Company, whether the existence of such successor is the result of a direct or indirect
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
